list.longDescription: Lists auth connection information for the usernames you’ve authorized. Unlike org:list, this command doesn’t check whether orgs are still valid.

device.description: authorize an org using a device code
device.longDescription: Authorize an org using a device code. You must open a browser, navigate to the verification URL, and enter the code. Log in, if not already logged in, and you’ll be prompted to allow the device to connect to the org.
device.enterCode: Enter %s user code in the verification URL %s
device.loginSuccess: Login successful for %s. You can now close the browser.

errors.demoModeSupport: Demo mode is not supported with Device Login
